name: ASAuthorizationSingleSignOnProvider
desc: A mechanism for generating requests to authenticate users with third-party providers.

items.name: init(identityProvider: URL)
items.desc: Creates a single sign-on (SSO) authorization provider.

items.name: var canPerformAuthorization: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates if the provider is capable of performing authorization within a given configuration.

items.name: func createRequest() -> ASAuthorizationSingleSignOnRequest
items.desc: Creates a single sign-on (SSO) authorization request.

items.name: class ASAuthorizationSingleSignOnRequest
items.desc: An OpenID authorization request that provides single sign-on (SSO) functionality.

items.name: var url: URL
items.desc: The URL of the identity provider.
